text: Walter Brack (November 20, 1880 - July 19, 1919) was a German backstroke and breaststroke swimmer who competed in the 1904 Summer Olympics. In the 1904 Olympics he won a gold medal in the 100 yard backstroke and a silver medal in the Men's 440 yard breastroke. He was born and died in Berlin. ==See also== * List of members of the International Swimming Hall of Fame ==References== ==External links== *profile Category:1880 births Category:1919 deaths Category:Swimmers from Berlin Category:German male swimmers Category:Olympic gold medalists for Germany Category:Olympic silver medalists for Germany Category:Olympic swimmers of Germany Category:Swimmers at the 1904 Summer Olympics Category:Medalists at the 1904 Summer Olympics Category:Male backstroke swimmers Category:Male breaststroke swimmers Category:Olympic gold medalists in swimming Category:Olympic silver medalists in swimming
title: Walter Brack
